fmt: --- Format json;               Uasge: normalize json data | jo fmt
color: --- Format json with color;    Uasge: normalize json data | jo color
l|list: --- Generate json list;        Uasge: jo list [argument...]
d|dict: --- Generate json dict;        Uasge: jo dict [argument...]
q: --- Query json data;           Uasge: jaon data | jo q [path] [argument...]
env: --- Get environment variables; Uasge: json data | jo env [path] [argument...]
